t: VPS+3+15 一键脚本菜单 2025 版 🚀

acs.t:
VPS 脚本 - Serv00 & Hysteria 2025 🚀

（原链接失效，用新备选。复制执行。）

1. Serv00 三协议 (vless/hy2/tuic5) - Sing-box 精装桶：
   wget -qO- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/eooce/sing-box/main/sb_00.sh | bash

2. 老王四合一 + 隧道 - Sing-box 增强：
   wget -qO- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/eooce/sing-box/main/sb_serv00.sh | bash

3. 清理 Serv00 进程：
   pkill -kill -u [用户名]

4. 卸载 Dashboard：
   pgrep -f 'dashboard' | xargs -r kill && rm -rf ~/.nezha-dashboard

5. 哪吒探针 Serv00 - AM科技版：
   wget -qO- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/amclubs/am-serv00-nezha/main/install-dashboard.sh | bash

6. Agent 保活 Crontab：
   (crontab -l; echo "*/12 * * * * pgrep -x \"nezha-agent\" > /dev/null || nohup /home/${USER}/.nezha-agent/start.sh >/dev/null 2>&1 &") | crontab -

7. Dashboard 保活 Crontab：
   (crontab -l; echo "*/12 * * * * pgrep -x \"dashboard\" > /dev/null || nohup /home/${USER}/.nezha-dashboard/start.sh >/dev/null 2>&1 &") | crontab -

8. AM Serv00 (vless vmess hy2)：
   wget -qO- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/amclubs/am-serv00-vmess/main/install_serv00_vless_vmess_hysteria2.sh | bash

9. 饭奇骏 Serv00 Play：
   wget -qO- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/frankiejun/serv00-play/main/start.sh | bash

10. 重置 Serv00 (杀进程删文件，小心!)：
    ps aux | grep $(whoami) | grep -v "sshd\|bash\|grep" | awk '{print $2}' | xargs -r kill -9 2>/dev/null && \
    crontab -l | grep -v "serv00keep" >rmcron && crontab rmcron >/dev/null 2>&1 && rm rmcron && \
    find ~ -type f -exec rm -f {} \; 2>/dev/null && find ~ -exec rm -rf {} \; 2>/dev/null

11. Serv00 登录域名：
    panel[数字].serv00.com / s[数字].serv00.com / web[数字].serv00.com

12. 勇哥 Serv00 快捷 - Sing-box YG：
    wget -qO- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/yonggekkk/sing-box-yg/main/serv00.sh | bash

13. 哪吒 V1 Serv00：
    wget -qO- https://vps8.de/serv00_nezha_dashboard.sh | bash

14. Hysteria 2 一键 - 官方 AA：
    wget -qO- https://get.hy2.sh | bash

15. Hysteria 状态/停止/重启/自启/启动：
    systemctl status hysteria-server.service / systemctl stop hysteria-server.service / systemctl restart hysteria-server.service / systemctl enable hysteria-server.service / systemctl start hysteria-server.service
